titleStmt.title: Paradoxes by J. De la Salle.
titleStmt.author: Hall, John, 1627-1656.

notesStmt.note: "A reissue of the sheets of the 1650 edition, with new t.p. and preliminaries added; original t.p. (preserved as 12th prelim. leaf) reads: Paradoxes by John Hall"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: page 29 faded with slight loss of print. Pages 18-39 from defective IU copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
